ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Very useful course for students interested in building a foundation for orals fields within early America, the early Republic, and American political history.
Absolutely. One of the best classes I've taken.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Highly useful introduction to the main questions and texts covering the history of the early Republic, particularly the political history of the time period. Was crucial for my own early research in terms of introducing questions around class and rank along with a broader look at the ways in which early American identity has been debated by historical actors and scholars.
Great orals prep. And just interesting questions to think about!
